title.rendered: Meet Our Team at the IFX EXPO International in Cyprus

content.rendered:
September 27,  2021, The Financial Commission will be exhibiting at the 2021 IFX Expo International which will take place on 4-6 October at the Parklane Hotel in Limassol, Cyprus. Valued broker members and interested parties are invited to join Commission representatives at our dedicated booth #62 to discuss Financial Commission’s services for online brokers, exchanges and fintech firms.

 

 

Financial Commission representatives will be ready to showcase the organization’s membership and certification options, as well as new value-added services from companies such as YourBourse, FinWizard and GETID. Attendees will also be able to get insights into Financial Commission’s operating metrics and find out how its external dispute resolution service helps thousands of traders in various ways each year. 

Financial Commission Chief Operating Officer, Nikolai Isayev said: “We are glad to be coming back to the IFX Expo in Limassol after Covid-19 lockdown, as the event has proven itself to be important for our industry in Europe and we will present our membership and value-added services aimed at garnering more customer satisfaction at a time when demand for retail trading is at unprecedented levels.”

The organization joins a list of more than 100 confirmed exhibitors and representatives from hundreds of financial services providers including retail brokers, fintech providers, prime brokers and payment technology leaders expected to attend the exclusive industry gathering.

About Financial Commission

Founded in 2013, the Financial Commission is a leading independent member-driven external dispute resolution (EDR) organization for international online brokerages that participate in global foreign exchange (forex), derivatives, CFD and digital currency markets.

Financial Commission provides efficient compliance and certification solutions to its members, alongside its External Dispute Resolution (EDR) mechanism that serves as an effective channel for processing complaints from clients of member firms.

To schedule an appointment with our representatives at the IFX Expo International, please email info@financialcommission.org.
